Engine.Name: Recipro kick
Engine.Description: Kick your opponent with a recipro boost

Engine.Name: Recipro Extend
Engine.Description: Extend your recipro boost, dealing damage

Voice.Name: Yell
Voice.Description: Shout at a high pitch dealing medium damage

Gigantification.Name: Gigantic Leap
Gigantification.Description: Leap on the opponent with great force

Hardening.Name: Red Gauntlet
Hardening.Description: Punch the opponent with a hardened hand

Hardening.Name: Red Riot Unbreakable
Hardening.Description: Deal damage with even further hardening

Jet.Name: Jet kick
Jet.Description: Land a kick on your opponent at jet speed

Zero Gravity.Name: Fling
Zero Gravity.Description: Fling away your opponent dealing damage

Zero Gravity.Name: Meteor Shower
Zero Gravity.Description: Land a lot of debris in a form of a shower on the opponent

Somnambulist.Name: Somnam Gas
Somnambulist.Description: Release somnambulist gas on the opponent

Somnambulist.Name: Gas burst
Somnambulist.Description: Release a burst of gas dealing damage

Navel Laser.Name: Navel Saber
Navel Laser.Description: Shoot a single beam of laser at the opponent

Navel Laser.Name: Laser Buffet
Navel Laser.Description: Shoot multiple laser beams continuosly at the opponent

Tail.Name: Tail fist
Tail.Description: Shape your tail in a fist and hit your opponent

Tail.Name: Tornado tail
Tail.Description: Spin your tail in tornado style while dealing damage

Air Propulsion.Name: Air cannon
Air Propulsion.Description: Send a cannon of air pressure at the opponent

Electric.Name: Electric Shot
Electric.Description: Shoot a bolt of Electricity at the opponent

Electric.Name: 1.3 Million Volts
Electric.Description: Release a lot of Electricity dealing high damage, but it cannot be used often

Warp gate.Name: Warp Punch
Warp gate.Description: Send a punch through a warp

Warp gate.Name: Warp trap
Warp gate.Description: Trap the opponent inside a warp dealing damages

Black hole.Name: Black hole
Black hole.Description: Damage your opponent with a black hole

Permeation.Name: Permeation punch
Permeation.Description: Punch the opponent by getting behind them through permeation

Permeation.Name: Permeation combo
Permeation.Description: Perform a combo on the opponent

Pop Off.Name: Pop off ball
Pop Off.Description: Throw a ball at the opponent

Pop Off.Name: Grape Rush
Pop Off.Description: Make a rope from your head balls and hit the opponent with them

Acid.Name: Acid Jet
Acid.Description: Send a jet of acid at the opponent

Acid.Name: Acid veil
Acid.Description: Throw up an acid veil damaging the opponent

Clones.Name: Gigantic Electroplast
Clones.Description: Create a huge clone and deal damage

Dark Shadow.Name: Twilight claws
Dark Shadow.Description: Call Dark shadow and attack the opponent with claws

Dark Shadow.Name: Black-ops Arms
Dark Shadow.Description: Call dark shadow and attack with Big arms

Dark Shadow.Name: Dark abyss
Dark Shadow.Description: attack by wrapping dark shadow around your body

Cremation.Name: Flame blast
Cremation.Description: Create blue flames and blast them at the opponent

Cremation.Name: Flame spray
Cremation.Description: Spray blue flames from both your hands

Cremation.Name: Flame tornado
Cremation.Description: Create a tornado of blue flames

Muscle Augmentation.Name: Muscle Punch
Muscle Augmentation.Description: Augment your Muscles in the arm and punch the opponent

Muscle Augmentation.Name: Muscle kick
Muscle Augmentation.Description: Augment your muscles in the legs and kick the opponent

Muscle Augmentation.Name: Full body Crush
Muscle Augmentation.Description: Crush your opponent by Augmenting all your body muscles

Decay.Name: Decay touch
Decay.Description: Touch your opponent and deal decay damage

Decay.Name: Decaying floor
Decay.Description: Decay the floor causing damage nearby

Creation.Name: Sword Creation
Creation.Description: create a sword and attack the opponent

Creation.Name: Lucky bag
Creation.Description: Create a bag of useful items and attack the opponent with them one by one

Frog.Name: Tongue Lash
Frog.Description: Lash your tongue at the opponent

Frog.Name: Tongue fling
Frog.Description: Grab your opponent by your tongue and fling them

Frog.Name: Rapid tongue combo
Frog.Description: Perform a tongue-hit combo rapidly on your opponent

AFO.Name: Red spiked claws
AFO.Description: Send red spikes at the opponent

AFO.Name: Wind cannon
AFO.Description: create a wind cannon at shoot it at the opponent

AFO.Name: Ultimate combo
AFO.Description: Create an ultimate combination of quirks and hit the opponent

OFA.Name: Delaware smash
OFA.Description: Create a small smash by the flick of your finger

OFA.Name: Detroit Smash
OFA.Description: Smash the opponent with a medium sized punch

OFA.Name: St.Louis smash
OFA.Description: Smash the opponent by a kick

OFA.Name: United States Of Smash
OFA.Description: Create a **very** strong smash dealing high damage

HHHC.Name: Fireball
HHHC.Description: Send a Fireball at the opponent

HHHC.Name: Ice and Fire combo
HHHC.Description: Send a high damage combo of fire and ice

Explosion.Name: AP shot
Explosion.Description: Narrow down your explosion and send a concentrated blast

Explosion.Name: Howitzer impact
Explosion.Description: Spin rapidly to create force and hit the opponent

Overhaul.Name: Ground Spikes
Overhaul.Description: Create spikes in the ground dealing damage

Overhaul.Name: Disassembling world
Overhaul.Description: Create huge spikes outwards dealing damage

Overhaul.Name: Disassembling touch
Overhaul.Description: Touch your opponent dealing high damage

Fierce Wings.Name: Homing feathers
Fierce Wings.Description: Send a bunch of sharp feathers at the opponent

Fierce Wings.Name: Feather blades
Fierce Wings.Description: Create 2 blades out of your feathers

Fierce Wings.Name: Feather rain
Fierce Wings.Description: Rain down a lot of feathers dealing high damage

Hell flame.Name: Flashfire fist: Jetburn
